placeholders.HERO_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Join Scrooge McDuck and his nephews on thrilling quests and treasure hunts!
placeholders.FOOTER_TEXT: © 2023 DuckTales Adventure. All rights reserved. Woo-oo!
placeholders.CTA_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Sign up now and start your own DuckTales adventure!
placeholders.NEWSLETTER_SUBHEADING_TEXT: Subscribe for exclusive DuckTales news, updates, and special offers!
placeholders.ABOUT_MISSION_STATMENT: To bring the joy and excitement of DuckTales to fans old and new through immersive digital experiences.
placeholders.ABOUT_VISION_STATEMENT: To create a world where everyone can experience the thrill of adventure and the warmth of family like the DuckTales gang.
placeholders.ABOUT_VALUES_STATEMENT: Family, Adventure, Curiosity, and a Splash of Mischief!
placeholders.CONTACT_SUBHEADER_TEXT: Reach out to us! We're always ready for a new adventure!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_01_TEXT: Who are the main characters in DuckTales?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_01_TEXT: The main characters include Scrooge McDuck, Huey, Dewey, Louie, Webby, and Launchpad McQuack, among others!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_02_TEXT: Is this based on the original series or the reboot?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_02_TEXT: Our adventure draws inspiration from both the classic series and the modern reboot, offering a perfect blend of nostalgia and fresh excitement!
placeholders.FAQ_QUESTION_03_TEXT: Do I need to know DuckTales to enjoy this adventure?
placeholders.FAQ_ANSWER_03_TEXT: Not at all! While fans will appreciate the references, our adventure is designed for everyone to jump in and have a quack-tastic time!
